aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: Single level bill of material as planned

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The single-level Bill of Material represents one sub-level of an assembly and does not include any lower-level subassemblies. In As-Planned lifecycle state all variants are covered ("120% BOM"). It includes multiple suppliers for the same component.

IEC61360:preferredName.IEC61360:langString: Single level bill of material as planned

IEC61360:definition.IEC61360:langString: The single-level Bill of Material represents one sub-level of an assembly and does not include any lower-level subassemblies. In As-Planned lifecycle state all variants are covered ("120% BOM"). It includes multiple suppliers for the same component.
Trait to ensure UUID v4 data format
Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.
Quantifiable number of objects in reference to the measurementUnit
Describes a Property containing a reference to one of the units in the Unit Catalog.
Describes the quantity in which the child part is assembled in the given parent object by providing a quantity value and the measurement unit in which the quantity is measured.
Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.
Trait to ensure UUID v4 data format
Set of child parts the parent object is assembled by (one structural level down).

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The single-level Bill of Material represents one sub-level of an assembly and does not include any lower-level subassemblies. In As-Planned lifecycle state all variants are covered ("120% BOM"). It includes multiple suppliers for the same component.
The Catena-X ID of the given part (e.g. the component), valid for the Catena-X dataspace.
Set of child parts in As-Planned lifecycle phase, of which the given parent object is assembled by (one structural level down).
Catena-X ID and meta data of the child part.
Timestamp when the relation between the parent part and the child part was created
Comprises the number of objects and the unit of measurement for the respective child objects
The number of objects related to the measurement unit
Unit of Measurement for the quantity of serialized objects
Timestamp when the relationship between parent part and child part was last modified.
The Catena-X ID of the child object which is assembled into the given parent part.

The single-level Bill of Material represents one sub-level of an assembly and does not include any lower-level subassemblies. In As-Planned lifecycle state all variants are covered ("120% BOM"). It includes multiple suppliers for the same component.
The Catena-X ID of the given part (e.g. the component), valid for the Catena-X dataspace.
Set of child parts in As-Planned lifecycle phase, of which the given parent object is assembled by (one structural level down).
Catena-X ID and meta data of the child part.
Timestamp when the relation between the parent part and the child part was created
Comprises the number of objects and the unit of measurement for the respective child objects
The number of objects related to the measurement unit
Unit of Measurement for the quantity of serialized objects
Timestamp when the relationship between parent part and child part was last modified.
The Catena-X ID of the child object which is assembled into the given parent part.
